name: Pro Pinball VR
description:
Pinball Pro VR features a free to play 360 degree pinball game for your Google Cardboard or compatible virtual reality headset.

With realistic physics in a virtual reality world, this game offers the most immersive pinball arcade game play on the App Store.

How To Play
- To start, look at the pinball machine coin slot and tap the button on the VR headset.
- To activate the ball launcher, look at the plunger and hold the button on the VR headset to pull the plunger.
Release trigger to launch the pinball.
- Flippers are activated by tapping the button on the headset.

* Google Cardboard VR or compatible virtual reality headset required
* Headset must have the NFC button. Google Cardboard V2 headset recommended.
* Older style headsets with magnet button does NOT work.
* Bluetooth gamepad supported. Use gamepad button in place of headset trigger.
* To Play in Non-VR mode, activate the toggle button located on the back side of the bedroom wall.
